      • TrueFalseQuestion

        public TrueFalseQuestion()
        Constructs a numeric question.
        Parameters:
        aTolerance - the tolerance that is allowed when checking the answer. For example, if tolerance is 0.01, then the response may be up to 0.01 away from the correct answer.
